entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
